attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updates on my favorite racist Cheeto and EVERYTIME I open the app my phone goes black and the app quits even after restarting my phone😡
attributes.title: Doesn’t work!!!!

attributes.review: This app caused me and my entire family to go into cardiac arrest I think Donald trump is trying to kill us with this trashy app my dog is currently seizing on the floor as I write this review. Donald this app just to rate it a one star and get it off the App Store pls 🥂🎈👃🏿👁👁🤡🤡👁
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch many times, it kept showing a orange peeling itself. This app is horrible, probably the worst I’ve ever seen.
attributes.title: don’t recommend.

attributes.review: This was horrible app everything I tried would not work and everything is just messed up !
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: When I downloaded itPut a whole bunch of viruses on my phone and now my phone is really slow I device our amazing president to update it please
attributes.title: Horrible app ✨

attributes.review: Seriously glitchy with side effects of racism, bigotry, xenophobia, and other horrible unspeakables. Would not recommend to anyone with a soul!
attributes.title: Seriously most terrible app I’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: Terrible can’t even do anything just a blank screen do not recomend for anyone do not purchase this app your phone may get a virus like mine do not get
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: This app glitches so bad it cant function right. It also threatened to steal my toaster??? What kinda app does that. Also I don’t own a toaster its my mom’s. Which really crossed the line what kind of person would threaten to steal my mom’s toaster?! IM ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTED!
attributes.title: REALLY BAD

attributes.review: As a dedicated conservative I have stood by 2 things in this blessed life of mine, Our Lord god and Trump. This app singlehandedly ruined my day because of how awful it was! I’m embarrassed for the administration putting this monstrosity out there! 😡!
attributes.title: Horrible App!

attributes.review: I mean I couldn’t even download the app without immediately throwing up. It just caused me to have the worst stomach ache ever!! So, anyways my cat just couldn’t stand to look at it so I had to delete :(
attributes.title: Cat and stomach :(
